title: Implement secure multi-factor authentication
description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
attributes_and_rules: User must provide additional authentication factors beyond just a password.
acceptance_criteria: User must successfully authenticate using multiple factors.
test_cases: Given a registered user, When they attempt to log in, Then they should be prompted for an additional authentication factor.

title: Manage password encryption and security
description: As a user, I want my password to be securely encrypted, so that it cannot be easily hacked.
attributes_and_rules: All passwords must be encrypted using industry-standard encryption methods.
acceptance_criteria: Passwords must be stored and handled securely.
test_cases: Given a user password, When it is stored in the system, Then it should be encrypted.

title: Implement session management
description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely, so that my data is protected during my interaction with the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Sessions must be securely initiated and terminated.
acceptance_criteria: User sessions must be handled securely with session timeouts and revocation.
test_cases: Given a user session, When it reaches its timeout, Then the session should be terminated.

title: Implement logout functionality
description: As a user, I want to be able to log out securely, so that my session cannot be hijacked.
attributes_and_rules: Hit the logout button to terminate the session instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Logging out must successfully terminate the user's session.
test_cases: Given an active session, When the user logs out, Then the session must be terminated.

title: Create a responsive user interface
description: As a user, I want to access the portal on any device, so that I can use the portal flexibly.
attributes_and_rules: The interface must adapt to different screen sizes and orientations.
acceptance_criteria: The portal interface must be accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
test_cases: Given a user with a tablet, When they access the portal, Then they should see a responsive UI.

title: Define style guides for UI
description: As a developer, I want consistent styling across the UI, so that users have a uniform experience.
attributes_and_rules: The style should be consistent with defined brand guidelines.
acceptance_criteria: UI components should follow predefined style guides.
test_cases: Given a new UI component, When it is added to the portal, Then it should match the style guide.

title: Ensure UI accessibility compliance
description: As a user, I want the portal to be accessible, so that I can navigate it easily despite any disabilities.
attributes_and_rules: The portal should comply with accessibility standards like WCAG 2.1.
acceptance_criteria: The portal should meet accessibility compliance requirements.
test_cases: Given a user with visual impairment, When they access the portal, Then it should be navigable using screen readers.

epic_title: Personalized Dashboard and User Profile Management
title: Implement personalized dashboard
description: As a user, I want to see personalized content on my dashboard, so that I can quickly access relevant information.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display personalized products and services based on user profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard content must be personalized based on user data.
test_cases: Given a user with specific preferences, When they log in, Then their dashboard should show personalized content.

epic_title: Personalized Dashboard and User Profile Management
title: Enable profile updates
description: As a user, I want to update my profile easily, so that my information is always up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Users should be able to update their profile information easily.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to update their profile information from the dashboard.
test_cases: Given a user, When they update their profile, Then the new information should be saved and displayed on the dashboard.

epic_title: Personalized Dashboard and User Profile Management
title: Set notification preferences
description: As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences, so that I only receive relevant alerts.
attributes_and_rules: Users should be able to customize their notification preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to set and save their notification preferences.
test_cases: Given a user, When they set their notification preferences, Then those preferences should be saved.
